 2013-02712013-03-07,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActNorthwest Territories Act
SubjectNorthwest Territories Borrowing Limits Regulations
PrecisNORTHWEST TERRITORIES BORROWING LIMITS REGULATIONS in order to modernize the governance of the borrowing limits to ensure accurate reporting of borrowing obligations against the borrowing limits and consistency with reporting in the annual territorial consolidated financial statements.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0039 Publication Date: 2013-03-27
